languages.text: Раса ксеносов т'ау использует машины с самосознанием, именуемые "дронами". Судя по следам на корпусе, этот экземпляр умело выпотрошили.

traits.locale_text: Раса ксеносов тау использует машины с самосознанием, именуемые "дронами". Судя по следам на корпусе, этот экземпляр умело выпотрошили.

languages.text: A xenos race called T'au employs self-aware machines they call "drones." Judging by the marks on the hull, this specimen was gutted quite deftly.
languages.original_text: Раса ксеносов т'ау использует машины с самосознанием, именуемые "дронами". Судя по следам на корпусе, этот экземпляр умело выпотрошили.

traits.locale_text: A xenos race called Tau employs self-aware machines they call 'drones'. Judging by the marks on the hull, this specimen was gutted quite deftly.
A xenos race called Tau employs self-aware machines they call 'drones'. Judging by the marks on the hull, this specimen was gutted deftly and cleverly.
A xenos race called Tau employs self-aware machines they call 'drones'. Judging by the marks on the hull, this specimen was gutted quite deftly.
A xenos race called T'au employs self-aware machines they call "drones." Judging by the marks on the hull, this specimen was gutted quite deftly.
A xenos race called T'au employs self-aware machines they call "drones." Judging by the marks on the hull, this specimen was gutted quite deftly.

languages.text: タウ族と呼ばれる異種族は「ドローン」と呼ばれる自己認識マシンを採用している。機体の印を見るかぎり、この被検体はかなり器用に中がくり抜かれている。
languages.original_text: A xenos race called T'au employs self-aware machines they call "drones." Judging by the marks on the hull, this specimen was gutted quite deftly.

traits.locale_text: タウ族と呼ばれる異種族は「ドローン」と呼ばれる自己認識マシンを採用している。機体の印を見るかぎり、この被検体はかなり器用に中がくり抜かれている。

languages.text: Una raza xenos conocida como los Tau emplea máquinas conscientes que denominan «drones». A juzgar por las marcas del casco de este, fue destripado por un experto.
languages.original_text: A xenos race called T'au employs self-aware machines they call "drones." Judging by the marks on the hull, this specimen was gutted quite deftly.

traits.locale_text: Una raza xenos conocida como los Tau emplea máquinas conscientes que denominan «drones». A juzgar por las marcas del casco de este, fue destripado por un experto.

languages.text: 这种拥有自我意识的机器被称为“无人机”，是名为“钛”的异形种族使用的机器。从机器外壳上的划痕来看，里面的东西已经被剥了个干净。
languages.original_text: A xenos race called T'au employs self-aware machines they call "drones." Judging by the marks on the hull, this specimen was gutted quite deftly.

traits.locale_text: 这种拥有自我意识的机器被称为“无人机”，是名为“钛”的异形种族使用的机器。从机器外壳上的划痕来看，里面的东西已经被剥了个干净。

languages.text: Les T'au, une race de xénos, emploient des machines dotées d'une conscience propre qu'ils désignent sous le nom de « drones ». À en juger par l'état de sa coque, ce spécimen a été évidé avec dextérité.
languages.original_text: A xenos race called T'au employs self-aware machines they call "drones." Judging by the marks on the hull, this specimen was gutted quite deftly.

traits.locale_text: Les T'au, une race de xénos, emploient des machines dotées d'une conscience propre qu'ils désignent sous le nom de « drones ». À en juger par l'état de sa coque, ce spécimen a été évidé avec dextérité.

languages.text: Ein Xenos-Volk namens Tau nutzt Maschinen mit Bewusstsein, die so genannten "Drohnen". Den Spuren auf dem Rumpf nach zu urteilen, wurde dieses Exemplar gekonnt ausgeweidet.
languages.original_text: A xenos race called T'au employs self-aware machines they call "drones." Judging by the marks on the hull, this specimen was gutted quite deftly.

traits.locale_text: Ein Xenos-Volk namens Tau nutzt Maschinen mit Bewusstsein, die so genannten "Drohnen". Den Spuren auf dem Rumpf nach zu urteilen, wurde dieses Exemplar gekonnt ausgeweidet.

languages.text: T'au denen bir zeno ırkı, "dron" dedikleri bilinçli makinelerden faydalanır. Gövdesindeki işaretlere bakılırsa bu numuneyi soyup soğana çevirmişler.
